MD004.//: alias: ul-style - allow for different list indicator characters per level

MD007.//: alias: ul-indent - start indented and nested lists are further indented

MD012.//: alias: no-multiple-blanks - allow for extra whitespace

MD013.//: alias: line-length - the max length of lines

MD029.//: alias: ol-prefix - require an ordered list numbering or all 1s

//: MD034: alias: no-bare-urls - literal URLs without friendly text
